reviewText: Kelly Galloup is in his element in this DVD, he brings you in as a fishing partner not as "this is how it;s done" you are with him all the way.  When he is hooked by the big brown you feel it too.  Kelly is one great guy you will watch this and the other DVD's he has out over and over.  I am glad each year to be able to stop by the Slide Inn and visit with him and I come away each time a little richer with what I have learned, and a little poorer with more tackle, but it's worth it.  Stop by and you'll agree.
Very informative hope to try some of his stuff,if you been nymphing not much of a change,just a different take on certain styles.
Very clear and precise techniques for every situation
Informative and instructional. Excellent material for those striving to improve their fly fishing skills.
The instruction is "real life" and the underwater photography opened my eyes to what I'm contending with.  Extremely helpful!!  Kelly if enjoyable to listen to as well as extremely knowledgeable.
Kelly has forgotten more about fishing technique than I will ever know.  I learned a lot
Was very informative. I learned alot
Standard Kelly Galloup video. Humerous, straight forward and highly informative. If you can't catch fish after watching this video, quit now because evidentally you are hopeless.
This video actually tells you how to read water and catch fish ... as opposed to just watching guys catch fish with no tips.
